data.actual_result: The mention highlights do not appear and just looks like normal text in the blurple/blue colour, until switching and returning to the channel where the mention is.
data.expected_result: The mention should highlight instantly with both the blue around the text, and the yellow on the whole line.
data.short_description: When mentioning everyone, here or yourself the blue & yellow highlights do not appear on/around the text.
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a channel where you have permission to mention everyone or here. - Mention everyone, here or yourself. - Analyse the outputted mention and see the missing highlights. - Switch channels and then return to the previous channel and both highlights should appear.
